#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
string s;
int a[33];
string s1,s2;
int x[44];
int y[44];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	int t;
	int i,n;
	int sum1,sum2;
	cin>>T;
	cin>>s;
	n=s.size();
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		a[s[i]-'a']=i;
	}
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		memset(x,0,sizeof(int)*33);
		memset(y,0,sizeof(int)*33);
		sum1=sum2=0;
		n=s1.size();
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			x[s1[i]-'a']++;
		n=s2.size();
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			y[s2[i]-'a']++;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			t=min(x[i],y[i]);
			x[i]-=t;
			y[i]-=t;
			if(x[i])
				sum1+=a[i];
			if(y[i])
				sum2+=a[i];
		}
		if(sum1>sum2)
			cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;
		else if(sum1<sum2)
			cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"TIE"<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
